sen.j: 「私に云く禅宗の三階は現に声を失ひて死す。」
sen.e: I say Sangai of the Zen sect died losing his voice as a matter of fact.'

sen.j: 「真言宗の善無畏は皮黒く、浄土教の善導は顛倒狂乱す。」
sen.e: Zenmui of the Shingon sect changed to black when he died, and Shandao of the Jodo (Pure Land) sect had wrong views and became crazy when he died.'

sen.j: 「他宗の祖師已に其れ此くの如し末弟の輩其の義知る可し。」
sen.e: The progenitors of other sects will be the same, the meaning of which their disciples should know.'

sen.j: 「師は是れ針の如し弟子檀那は糸の如し、其の人命終して阿鼻獄に入るとは此れ也云云。」
sen.e: A teacher is like a needle and his or her disciples and supporters are like a thread, which is exemplified as they die and go to the Avici hell.'

sen.j: 日蓮は、これらの仏典を論拠として、真言宗や律宗など他宗の祖師を論難し自宗の優位性を主張した。
sen.e: Based on these Buddhist scriptures, Nichiren criticized the progenitors of other sects such as the Shingon sect and the Ritsu sect and insisted on the superiority of his own school.

sen.j: そのため、この教説を引き継ぎ、排他的あるいは独善的な教条を掲げて布教する一部の宗派による観念的脅迫が問題視されている。
sen.e: Thus, some religious schools which inherit this teaching and propagate their schools by putting up the exclusive or self-righteous dogmas make ideological threats, which are perceived as a problem.
